PHRASE.LANG: Ethnic clothing that has been dyed a brilliant green and delicately embroidered with traditional patterns.\nThe light cape draped over the shoulders and light green flower corsage wrapped around the waist add the finishing touches to this cute design. [#Legal]

Cette tenue ethnique teinte en vert vif arbore des motifs traditionnels délicatement brodés.\nLa cape légère qu'on enroule autour des épaules et le bouquet de fleurs vert clair ceignant la taille mettent la touche finale à cette jolie tenue. [#Legal]

Das Trachtengewand in leuchtendem Grün ist mit landestypischen zierlichen Mustern bestickt.\nDer leichte Schulterumhang und die hellgrüne Blumencorsage, die um die Taille geschnürt wird, ergänzen dieses hübsche Ensemble. [#Legal]

Vestiti etnici tinti con un pigmento verde brillante e ricamati con motivi tradizionali.\nLa mantellina coprispalle e i decori floreali verde chiaro attorno alla vita sono i tocchi finali di questo grazioso completo. [#Legal]

El atuendo étnico está teñido en vivos tonos verdes y delicadamente bordado con motivos tradicionales.\nLa ligera capa que cubre los hombros y el cinturón de flor verde claro ponen los toques finales a este bonito diseño. [#Legal]

Ethnic clothing that has been dyed a brilliant green and delicately embroidered with traditional patterns.\nThe light cape draped over the shoulders and light green flower corsage wrapped around the waist add the finishing touches to this cute design. [#Legal]
